description:
A semi-recent trunk change added a new flag "osapi_compute_listen_port" which is defined in nova/service.py. When trying to run the nova manage command "nova-manage project zip ..." an exception is thrown about the missing flag:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/4299/

The fix simple: move the flag to nova/flags.py
title: Nova manage blows up with missing flag

comments.content:
A semi-recent trunk change added a new flag "osapi_compute_listen_port" which is defined in nova/service.py. When trying to run the nova manage command "nova-manage project zip ..." an exception is thrown about the missing flag:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/4299/

The fix simple: move the flag to nova/flags.py
